response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Calculate the Sum of Digits\", \"description\": \"Write a function that calculates the sum of digits for a given number. The function should take an integer as input and return the sum of its digits.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of the digits in the input number.\\n\", \"code\": \"def sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n    if n < 0:\\n        raise ValueError('Input must be a non-negative integer')\\n    return sum(int(digit) for digit in str(n))\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_of_digits(123) == 6\", \"assert sum_of_digits(-123) == 'ValueError' if run locally else None\", \"assert sum_of_digits(999) == 27\", \"assert sum_of_digits(10) == 1\"] }"
